ui.panel.config.introduction: Here it is possible to configure your components and ioBroker. Not everything is possible to configure from the UI yet, but we're working on it.
ui.panel.config.advanced_mode.hint_enabl: Mankas agordaj opcioj? Ebligu altnivelan reĝimon
ui.panel.config.integration_panel_move.m: Missing the ZHA config panel? It was moved to the ZHA entry on the {integrations_page}.
Missing the Z-Wave config panel? It was moved to the Z-Wave entry on the {integrations_page}.
ui.panel.config.common.editor.confirm_un: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.areas.caption: Areas
ui.panel.config.areas.description: Overview of all areas in your home.
ui.panel.config.areas.picker.introductio: Areas are used to organize where devices are. This information will be used throughout ioBroker to help you in organizing your interface, permissions and integrations with other systems.
To place devices in an area, use the link below to navigate to the integrations page and then click on a configured integration to get to the device cards.
ui.panel.config.areas.picker.no_areas: Looks like you have no areas yet!
ui.panel.config.areas.editor.name: Name
ui.panel.config.areas.delete.confirmatio: Are you sure you want to delete this area?
All devices in this area will become unassigned.
ui.panel.config.helpers.caption: Helpers
ui.panel.config.helpers.description: Elements that can help build automations.
ui.panel.config.core.caption: General
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: Changing your configuration can be a tiresome process. We know. This section will try to make your life a little bit easier.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Editor disabled because config stored in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.info.caption: Info
ui.panel.config.info.developed_by: Disvolvita de amaso da mojosaj homoj.
ui.panel.config.info.system_health_error: Komponento pri Sistema Sano ne estas ŝarĝita. Aldonu 'system_health:' al configuration.yaml
ui.panel.config.logs.caption: Logs
ui.panel.config.logs.multiple_messages: mesaĝo unuafoje okazis je {time} kaj aperas {counter} fojojn
ui.panel.config.lovelace.caption: Lovelace Dashboards
ui.panel.config.lovelace.dashboards.conf: Are you sure you want to delete this dashboard?
ui.panel.config.lovelace.dashboards.cant: Dashboards defined in YAML cannot be edited from the UI. Change them in configuration.yaml.
The standard Lovelace dashboard cannot be edited from the UI. You can hide it by setting another dashboard as default.
ui.panel.config.lovelace.dashboards.deta: The URL should contain a - and cannot contain spaces or special characters, except for _ and -
Set as default on this device
Remove as default on this device
ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.confi: Are you sure you want to delete this resource?
ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.refre: You have to refresh the page to complete the removal, do you want to refresh now?
ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.cant_: You are using Lovelace in YAML mode, therefore you cannot manage your resources through the UI. Manage them in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.detai: Adding resources can be dangerous, make sure you know the source of the resource and trust them. Bad resources could seriously harm your system.
ui.panel.config.server_control.caption: Server Controls
ui.panel.config.server_control.descripti: Restart and stop the ioBroker server
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Validate your configuration if you recently made some changes to your configuration and want to make sure that it is all valid
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.r: Some parts of ioBroker can reload without requiring a restart. Hitting reload will unload their current YAML configuration and load the new one.
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.s: Control your ioBroker server… from ioBroker.
Are you sure you want to restart ioBroker?
Are you sure you want to stop ioBroker?
ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Customizations
ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Tweak per-entity attributes. Added/edited customizations will take effect immediately. Removed customizations will take effect when the entity is updated.
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.includ: Ŝajnas, ke via configuration.yaml ne taŭgas
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.not_ap: Ŝanĝoj faritaj ĉi tie estas skribita en ĝi, sed ne estos aplikita post agordo reŝarĝo krom se la inkluzivo estas en loko.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_cus: La sekvaj atributoj estas jam agorditaj en customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_out: La sekvaj atributoj estas agorditaj de ekstere de customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.different_incl: Eble per domajno, globo aŭ malsama inkluzivo.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_set: La sekvaj atributoj de la ento estas agorditaj laŭprogramaj.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_ove: Vi povas superregi ilin, se vi volas.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_not: La sekvaj atributoj ne estis agorditaj. Agordu ilin, se vi volas
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automations
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: The automation editor allows you to create and edit automations. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured ioBroker correctly.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: We couldn’t find any editable automations
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Nur aŭtomatoj difinitaj en automations.yaml estas redakteblaj.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.delete: Ĉu vi certas, ke vi volas forigi ĉi tiun aŭtomatigon?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Use automations to bring your home alive.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Only automations in automations.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Triggers are what starts the processing of an automation rule. It is possible to specify multiple triggers for the same rule. Once a trigger starts, ioBroker will validate the conditions, if any, and call the action.
Are you sure you want to delete this?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit: Conditions are optional and will prevent further execution unless all conditions are satisfied.
Are you sure you want to delete this?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action: The actions are what ioBroker will do when the automation is triggered.
Are you sure you want to delete this?
ui.panel.config.script.caption: Scripts
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured ioBroker correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.picker.no_scripts: We couldn’t find any editable scripts
ui.panel.config.script.editor.introducti: Uzu skriptojn por ekzekuti sinsekvon de agoj.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.delete_con: Are you sure you want to delete this script?
ui.panel.config.script.editor.sequence_s: La sekvenco de agoj de ĉi tiu skribo.
ui.panel.config.scene.caption: Scenoj
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.introductio: La scenredaktilo permesas krei kaj redakti scenojn. Bonvolu sekvi la suban ligilon por legi la instrukciojn por certigi, ke vi agordis ioBroker ĝuste.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.no_scenes: Ni ne povis trovi iujn ajn redakteblajn scenojn
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.only_editab: Nur scenoj difinitaj en scenes.yaml estas redakteblaj.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.delete_conf: Ĉu vi certas, ke vi volas forigi ĉi tiun scenon?
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.introductio: Uzi scenojn alporti vian hejmon viva.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.load_error_: Nur scenoj en scenes.yaml estas redakteblaj.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.unsaved_con: Vi havas nekonservitajn ŝanĝojn. Ĉu vi estas certa, ke vi volas foriri?
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.name: Nomo
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.devices.int: Aldoni la aparatojn kiu vi volas esti inkluzivita en via sceno. Agordi ĉiuj aparatoj al la stato vi deziras por ĉi tiu sceno.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.in: Entoj ne apartenantaj al aparato povas esti starigitaj ĉi tie.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.de: Se vi aldonas enton, kiu apartenas al aparato, la aparato estos aldonita.
ui.panel.config.cloud.caption: ioBroker Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Control away from home, integrate with Alexa and Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: ioBroker Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
ioBroker Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with ioBroker Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of ioBroker Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of ioBroker away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of ioBroker Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for ioBroker Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your ioBroker instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: ioBroker Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance will be available at
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the ioBroker skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the ioBroker skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.syn: Failed to sync your entities to Google, ask Google 'Hey Google, sync my devices' to sync your entities.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to ioBroker from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.title: Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.title: Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.a: The webhook is available at the following url:
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.m: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.i: If you no longer want to use this webhook, you can
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.c: Are you sure you want to disable this webhook?
ui.panel.config.devices.caption: Devices
ui.panel.config.devices.name: Name
ui.panel.config.devices.automation.no_de: There are no automations available for this device.
ui.panel.config.devices.cant_edit: You can only edit items that are created in the UI.
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_rename_e: Ĉu vi ankaŭ volas alinomi la identigilon de viaj entoj?
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this device?
ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entities
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: ioBroker keeps a registry of every entity it has ever seen that can be uniquely identified. Each of these entities will have an entity ID assigned which will be reserved for just this entity.
Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: Do you want to enable {number} entities?
This will make them available in ioBroker again if they are now disabled.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Do you want to disable {number} entities?
Disabled entities will not be added to ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: Do you want to remove {number} entities?
Only {number} selected entities can be removed.
You should remove them from your Lovelace config and automations if they contain these entities.

You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart ioBroker before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Persons
ui.panel.config.person.description: Manage the persons that ioBroker tracks.
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: Note: persons configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.person.no_persons_create: Looks like you have not created any persons yet.
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this person?
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete2: All devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.name: Name
ui.panel.config.person.detail.device_tra: Select the devices that belong to this person.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.no_device_: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.
ui.panel.config.zone.caption: Zones
ui.panel.config.zone.description: Manage the zones you want to track persons in.
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.
ui.panel.config.zone.no_zones_created_ye: Looks like you have not created any zones yet.
ui.panel.config.zone.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this zone?
ui.panel.config.zone.configured_in_yaml: Zones configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Drag the marker on the map to move the home zone.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone_narr: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
ui.panel.config.zone.home_zone_core_conf: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.name: Name
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.icon_error_m: Icon should be in the format prefix:iconname, for example: mdi:home
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.
ui.panel.config.integrations.caption: Integrations
ui.panel.config.integrations.no_integrat: Seems like you don't have any integations configured yet. Click on the button below to add your first integration!
ui.panel.config.integrations.note_about_: Not all integrations can be configured via the UI yet.
ui.panel.config.integrations.rename_dial: Edit the name of this config entry
ui.panel.config.integrations.ignore.conf: Ĉu vi certas, ke vi ne volas agordi ĉi tiun integriĝon? Vi povas malfari tion alklakante "Montri ignoratajn integriĝojn" en la superfluta menuo en la supra dekstra.
Ĉi tio igos la integriĝon aperi en viaj malkovritaj integriĝoj, kiam ĝi estos malkovrita. Ĉi tio eble postulas rekomenci aŭ daŭri iom da tempo.
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: Are you sure you want to delete this integration?
Restart ioBroker to finish removing this integration
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_flow: Ne ĉiuj bezonataj kampoj estas plenigitaj
This step requires you to visit an external website to be completed.
Please wait while the integration is being installed
ui.panel.config.users.caption: Users
ui.panel.config.users.users_privileges_n: The users group is a work in progress. The user will be unable to administer the instance via the UI. We're still auditing all management API endpoints to ensure that they correctly limit access to administrators.
ui.panel.config.users.editor.caption: View user
ui.panel.config.users.editor.name: Name
ui.panel.config.users.editor.system_gene: Ne eblis forigi la sistemo generita uzantoj.
Unable to update system generated users.
ui.panel.config.users.editor.confirm_use: Ĉu vi certas, ke vi volas forigi {name} ?
ui.panel.config.users.add_user.caption: Add user
ui.panel.config.users.add_user.name: Name
ui.panel.config.mqtt.title: MQTT
ui.panel.config.zha.introduction: Here it is possible to configure the ZHA component. Not everything is possible to configure from the UI yet, but we're working on it.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Devices will show up here once discovered.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: No devices where found, make sure they are in paring mode and keep them awake while discovering is running.
ui.panel.config.zha.network_management.i: Komandoj, kiuj efikas sur la tutan reton
ui.panel.config.zha.add.caption: Add Devices
ui.panel.config.zha.add.description: Add devices to the Zigbee network
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.head: Administra aparato
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.intr: Ruli ZHA-komandojn, kiuj efikas al unuopa aparato. Elektu aparaton por vidi liston de disponeblaj komandoj.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.hint: Noto: Dormaj (bateriaj) aparatoj bezonas esti vekitaj kiam vi plenumas komandojn kontraŭ ili. Vi ĝenerale povas veki dormigan aparaton ekigante ĝin.
Iuj aparatoj kiel Xiaomi-sensiloj havas butonon de vekiĝo, kiun vi povas premi je ~ 5 duaj intertempoj, kiuj tenas aparatojn vekitaj dum vi interagas kun ili.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.help: Elekti aparato por vidi po-aparato ebloj.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Elekti grapolon por vidi atributoj kaj komandoj.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.introductio: Clusters are the building blocks for Zigbee functionality. They seperate functionality into logical units. There are client and server types and that are comprised of attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Elekti atributon por vidi aŭ agordi ĝian valoron.
Akiri la valoron por la elektita atributo.
Agordi atributvaloron por la specifita grupo sur la specifita ento.
ui.panel.config.zha.network.caption: Network
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.caption: Groups
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.group_details: Here are all the details for the selected Zigbee group.
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.create_group_: Enter the required details to create a new zigbee group
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.group_: Select a group to issue a bind command.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.cluste: Select clusters to bind to the selected group.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.bind_b: Bind the selected group to the selected device clusters.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.unbind: Unbind the selected group from the selected device clusters.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Run commands that affect the Z-Wave network. You won't get feedback on whether most commands succeeded, but you can check the OZW Log to try to find out.
ui.panel.config.zwave.node_management.in: Run Z-Wave commands that affect a single node. Pick a node to see a list of available commands.
ui.panel.config.zwave.node_management.no: Select node to view per-node options
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: Rigardu la protokolon. 0 estas la minimumo (ŝarĝas tutan protokolo) kaj 1000 estas la maksimumo. Ŝarĝo montros statikan protokolon kaj vosto aŭtomate ĝisdatigos kun la lasta specifita nombro da linioj de la protokolo.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: This may take a while depending on the size of your network.
Awake nodes have been queried. Sleeping nodes will be queried when they wake.
